Clinic Highlights

  • Special amenities: The clinic will offer special amenities such as medical spa services, special aesthetic services on skin and dental, gourmet food and other luxury amenities to help patients relax and feel pampered.
  • Highly qualified staff: The clinic will have a team of highly qualified and experienced medical professionals who are experts in their respective fields.

General, Internal & Family Medicine

We follow medical practice that focus on the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of illness and disease.

  • Primary care for adults to treat a wide range of medical conditions, from minor illnesses to chronic diseases.
  • Internal medicine focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases in adults.
  • Family medicine, on the other hand, focuses on the comprehensive care of individuals and families across all ages.
  • With many people seeking IV treatments for various health and wellness concerns. IV treatments involve the administration of nutrients, vitamins, and other supplements directly into the bloodstream through an intravenous infusion such as Vitamin C, Glutathione, Hydration, Anti-aging IV therapies etc.
  • Our clinics will offer customized IV treatments tailored to the specific needs and concerns of each individual.

Pediatrics & Clinic for differently abled children

  • Dubai's population has grown significantly in recent years, with a growing number of families and children in the city. This has led to an increased demand for pediatric services.
  • We offer a range of pediatric services, including preventive care, routine check-ups, vaccinations, and specialized treatments for children with complex medical needs.
  • We have specialized treatments for differently abled children such as Pediatric Rehabilitation Medicine focusing on physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy etc.
  • Development pediatrics for behavioral disorders in children. Developmental pediatricians work with children who have conditions such as autism and intellectual disabilities.

ENT

  • Our ENT department , specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of disorders related to Ear , Nose and Throat and also structures of the head and neck.
  • Ear conditions such as ear infections and hearing loss , Nose Conditions such as Sinusitis and allergies ,Throat conditions such as Tonsillitis and Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease , Head and Neck Conditions such as Head and Neck Tumors , Facial Trauma.
  • Speech therapy , Sleep Apnea and Snoring have been specialized treatments under ENT.
  • Our treatment plans are individualized based on the specific diagnosis and the patient's overall health.

Gynaecology & Obstetrics

  • To generate a healthier generation ,we should follow healthier life style practices during pregnancy.
  • Pre-pregnancy preparation , pregnancy period and post pregnancy period plays significance role in a baby’s health.
  • Our wellness clinic focuses on treatment options for both gynecological and infertility issues. Treatment may include medication, surgery, assisted reproductive techniques such as in vitro fertilization (IVF), and lifestyle changes such as diet and exercises.

Aesthetics & Cosmetology

  • The growth of aesthetics services in UAE has crossed one billion.
  • UAE has become a world hub for people from all over the world ,earlier people used to fly to London and US to get quality aesthetic services performed.
  • UAE booming tourism industry has been a key driver in the growth of aesthetics services.
  • According to market research , the global aesthetic market was valued at around USD 12.5 billion in 2018 and it crossed USD 20 billion in 2022.
  • Our treatments and procedures aim to improve a person's appearance. Services include liposuction ,botox, dermal fillers, microblading, body toning , CoolSculpting, Mesotherapy and other non-invasive or minimally invasive procedures.
  • We help in boosting client’s confidence and self-esteem, which will have a positive impact on their mental and emotional wellbeing.

Clinical psychology, Healing & Physiotherapy

  • Mental health is an essential aspect of overall health and well-being. It affects how we think, feel, behave and impacts our ability to cope with stress, maintain healthy relationships and function in our daily lives. We also need to be physically fit to have a healthy mind hence exercise is equally important.
  • Clinical psychology plays a critical role in promoting mental health by diagnosing and treating mental health disorders, providing therapy , counseling services and conducting research to develop new treatments and interventions.
  • Medical healing therapies refer to various treatments or interventions that are used to improve or restore a person's physical or mental health.Therapies include acupuncture, herbal remedies, meditation, and other non-invasive approaches to healing such as psychotherapy, cognitive-behavioral therapy etc.
  • Physiotherapy helps to have positive effects on mental health, cardiovascular health ,rehabilitation after injury or surgery, prevention of injuries, management of chronic conditions, improved mobility and overall quality of life through exercises and physical activities.

Dermatology & Laser Treatments

  • Dubai is a hub for dermatology and laser treatments, offering a wide range of advanced procedures and treatments for various skin conditions and concern.
  • Dubai's reputation as a luxury destination for medical tourism has contributed to the growth of the laser treatment industry, as people are willing to travel to Dubai for high-quality and advanced laser treatments.
  • Our clinics will offer advanced treatments in laser hair removal from all areas of the body, acne treatment , skin rejuvenation, pigmentation treatment,scar removal, anti-aging, facial contouring, microneedling, chemical peeling etc.

Dental

  • The growth of dental services in Dubai is largely due to the city's strong economy, which has attracted a diverse range of people from around the world.
  • Dental cosmetology, in particular, has become increasingly popular in Dubai. This involves the use of advanced technology and techniques to enhance the appearance of teeth and create a more attractive smile. Services such as teeth whitening, dental veneers, and orthodontics are in high demand.
  • In addition to cosmetic dentistry and general dental services, such as routine check-ups, fillings, and extractions , we offer specialized services, such as pediatric dentistry, periodontics, and endodontics.

Orthopedic

Our Orthopedic specialty focuses on the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of conditions and injuries related to the musculoskeletal system. This system includes bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, tendons, and other connective tissues.

  • Conditions such as fractures , traumatic injuries to the musculoskeletal system, Osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis, or other degenerative joint diseases comes under orthopedic.
  • Sports-related injuries, such as ligament tears, tendonitis, and stress fractures, spine disorders, hand and upper extremity, foot and ankle, pediatric orthopedics, musculoskeletal Oncology, orthopedic rehabilitation etc are conditions treated under Orthopedic.

Orthopedic care often involves a multidisciplinary approach, with orthopedic surgeons working closely with physical therapists, pain management specialists, and other healthcare professionals to provide comprehensive care for patients with musculoskeletal conditions.

Ophthalmology

Our ophthalmology department focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of eye disorders and diseases.

  • Eye Examinations: Ophthalmologists perform comprehensive eye examinations to assess the health of the eyes and detect any abnormalities. These exams may include tests for visual acuity, refractive errors, eye pressure, and examination of the retina and other structures.
  • Diagnosis and Treatment of Eye Conditions: We treat a wide range of eye conditions, including cataracts, glaucoma, diabetic retinopathy, macular degeneration, and various infections. They may prescribe medications, recommend surgical interventions, or provide other forms of treatment.
  • Prescription of Glasses and Contact Lenses: Ophthalmologists often prescribe corrective lenses, such as glasses or contact lenses, to improve visual acuity in individuals with refractive errors like myopia (nearsightedness), hyperopia (farsightedness), and astigmatism.
  • Pediatric Ophthalmology: We specialize in pediatric ophthalmology, focusing on the eye health of children. They address issues such as lazy eye (amblyopia), strabismus (misalignment of the eyes), and other pediatric eye conditions.

Our healthcare facility, provide essential services to promote and maintain good vision and eye health.

Ayurveda

Ayurveda reconnects our mind, body and soul with ultimate source of healing.

  • Ayurveda treatments are becoming increasingly important and popular around the world due to their holistic approach to health and wellness.
  • Ayurveda has result oriented treatments for life style diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, obesity and arthritis etc.
  • Ayurveda offers a holistic approach to these conditions, focusing on lifestyle changes, dietary modifications and herbal remedies.
  • During the period 2018 – 2019 ,nearly 495,000 people have travelled to Kerala for Ayurvedic medical treatments, especially covering from GCC. After covid this has reduced due to travel restrictions and has increased the popularity of Ayurveda in GCC.
  • People over the world travel to Kerala to have the authentic ayurvedic treatments. We can cater this more effectively in UAE now with our ayurvedic clinics. We ensure the same quality of treatments and authenticity in a luxurious environment.

Clinical Yoga

“Clinical yoga" typically refers to the application of yoga practices and principles in a clinical or healthcare setting with a specific focus on addressing health conditions, promoting well-being, and supporting therapeutic outcomes. This approach involves the integration of yoga techniques into the overall healthcare plan, often under the guidance of healthcare professionals.

  • Clinical yoga is often integrated into conventional medical practices to complement traditional healthcare approaches. It may be used as a complementary therapy alongside medications and other medical interventions.
  • It is tailored to the individual needs and health conditions of the patient. It emphasizes a patient-centered approach, recognizing that each person may require a unique combination of yoga practices based on their health goals and limitations.
  • Clinical yoga may involve specific therapeutic yoga practices tailored to address particular health issues. For example, modified poses, breathing exercises, and meditation techniques may be used to alleviate symptoms associated with chronic pain, stress, anxiety, or other health conditions.

Clinical Yoga can be applied to a wide range of health conditions, including musculoskeletal issues, cardiovascular health, mental health conditions, respiratory conditions and more. Regular yoga practice

Unani

Unani medicine utilizes a combination of natural therapies, including herbal medicines, dietary recommendations, regimental therapy.

  • There are six essential factors for maintaining health in Unani medicine. They include air, food and drink, bodily movement and repose, sleep and wakefulness, emotions, and excretion and retention.
  • Unani medicine takes a holistic approach to health, considering the interconnectedness of the body, mind, and spirit.
  • Unani physicians diagnose illnesses through a combination of observation, questioning, and pulse examination. Pulse diagnosis, in particular, is a significant component of the diagnostic process.

We integrate Unani medicine with modern medical practices, fostering collaboration between Unani practitioners and allopathic healthcare providers to provide the patient with comprehensive and coordinated care.

Siddha

"Siddha" refers along with Ayurveda, Yoga & Naturopathy, Unani and Homeopathy. Siddha medicine emphasizes the use of natural substances, diet, and lifestyle practices to maintain health and treat diseases.

  • Siddha medicine utilizes a variety of treatment modalities, including herbal medicines, mineral preparations, diet and lifestyle recommendations. Some treatments may involve external therapies, such as oil massages.
  • Siddha practitioners provide guidance on diet and lifestyle to maintain balance and prevent diseases. This includes recommendations on the timing and composition of meals, physical activity, and sleep patterns.

Siddha medicine places importance on preventive healthcare. Practices to promote overall well-being and prevent the onset of diseases are integral to the system.

Homeopathy

Homeopathy is a system of alternative medicine. Homeopathy is based on the principle that a substance that produces symptoms in a healthy individual can be used to treat similar symptoms in a sick individual. This principle is known as the "law of similars."

  • Minimum Dose: Homeopathic remedies are prepared through a process of dilution and potentization. The idea is that the more a substance is diluted, the more potent it becomes. Homeopaths believe that very small doses of a substance can stimulate the body's vital force to restore balance and promote healing.
  • Individualized Treatment: Homeopathy emphasizes individualized treatment. Each person is considered unique, and the homeopathic remedy is chosen based on a person's specific symptoms, both physical and emotional.
  • Holistic Approach: Homeopathy takes a holistic approach to health, considering the whole person rather than just the symptoms of a particular illness. This includes taking into account mental, emotional, and physical aspects of an individual's health.
  • Homeopathic remedies are typically administered in the form of small sugar pellets or liquid solutions.

Our qualified and experienced healthcare professionals allows patients to choose a combination of treatments that align with their preferences and beliefs.

Beauty, Personal Care & Wellness

In a clinic setting, the integration of beauty, personal care, and wellness can create a holistic approach to patient care. These are interconnected aspects of an individual's overall health and lifestyle. These terms encompass a wide range of practices and products designed to enhance physical appearance, promote self-care, and contribute to a sense of well-being.

  • Beauty: Beauty refers to the physical attributes and aesthetics of an individual. It can include aspects such as clear skin, healthy hair, well-groomed nails, and other features that are often considered visually appealing.
  • Personal Care: Involves maintaining cleanliness and good hygiene practices such as hair care, including washing, conditioning, and styling. Haircuts and hair treatments are also part of this category.Body care such as moisturizing , exfoliating, and protecting the skin from environmental factors are essential elements of personal care.
  • Wellness : Wellness encompasses physical wellness, Mental and Emotional wellness ,Holistic beauty and wellness , self-care etc. Developing a balanced and personalized approach that aligns with one's values and health goals is key. It's important to prioritize practices that contribute to both the external and internal aspects of well-being.

Incorporating elements of beauty, personal care, and wellness can enhance the overall patient experience and contribute to their well-being.

Electronic Muscle Stimulators (EMS)

Electronic Muscle Stimulators (EMS), also known as neuromuscular electrical stimulation (NMES) or electrotherapy, are devices that use electrical impulses to stimulate muscles.

  • Muscle Rehabilitation: EMS devices are commonly used in physical therapy and rehabilitation settings to aid in the recovery of injured or weakened muscles. They can help prevent muscle atrophy and improve muscle strength after surgery or injury.
  • Pain Management: EMS is sometimes employed as part of pain management strategies. Electrical stimulation can help modulate pain signals, providing relief for individuals experiencing chronic pain or discomfort.
  • Orthopedic Conditions: EMS for patients with orthopedic conditions, such as muscle strains, sprains, or tendon injuries. It can be incorporated into the overall treatment plan to enhance muscle function.
  • Sports Medicine: EMS is utilized in sports medicine for muscle conditioning and recovery. Athletes may use these devices to complement their training and reduce muscle soreness,muscle training , development and toning. It also improves blood circulation.

Our qualified healthcare professionals assess each patient's individual needs and conditions to their treatment plan.

  • Our home care health services allow individuals to receive medical care and support in the comfort of their own homes.
  • Home care health services include nursing care, physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy , IV therapies etc.
  • Comfort , less time and technology has made home services more viable.
